tool_description: Get statistics on thousands of planets in the known universe. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/planets.
title: Planets by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/planets
api_list.description: Get a list of planets matching specified parameters. Returns at most 30 results. To access more than 30 results, use the offset parameter to offset results in multiple API calls.

parameters.name: max_period
parameters.description: maximum orbital period of the planet in Earth days.

parameters.name: max_temperature
parameters.description: maximum average surface temperature of the planet in Kelvin.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination.

parameters.name: max_distance_light_year
parameters.description: maximum distance the planet is from Earth in light years.

parameters.name: min_distance_light_year
parameters.description: minimum distance the planet is from Earth in light years.

parameters.name: max_mass
parameters.description: maximum mass of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 1.898 × 10^27 kg).

parameters.name: max_semi_major_axis
parameters.description: maximum semi major axis of planet in astronomical units (AU).

parameters.name: min_mass
parameters.description: minimum mass of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 1.898 × 10^27 kg).

parameters.name: min_semi_major_axis
parameters.description: minimum semi major axis of planet in astronomical units (AU).

parameters.name: min_temperature
parameters.description: minimum average surface temperature of the planet in Kelvin.

parameters.name: max_radius
parameters.description: maximum average radius of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 69911 km).

parameters.name: min_radius
parameters.description: minimum average radius of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 69911 km).

parameters.name: min_period
parameters.description: minimum orbital period of the planet in Earth days.

utterances.utterance: Find planets with an orbital period of less than 365 Earth days.
Show me planets with a surface temperature below 300 Kelvin.
List planets that are at least 10 light years away from Earth.
Get information on planets with a mass less than 2 Jupiters.
Find planets with a semi major axis between 0.5 and 5 AU.
Show planets with a radius greater than 0.8 Jupiters.
Find planets with a minimum temperature of 150 Kelvin.
Get planets with a maximum distance of 50 light years from Earth.
Show me planets with an orbital period longer than 500 Earth days.
